mapper.insert:
insert ignore into clan_war_log (attacker_tag, defender_tag, war_tag, star, destruction_percentage, attack_order) values
(#{item.attackerTag}, #{item.defenderTag}, #{item.warTag}, #{item.star}, #{item.destructionPercentage}, #{item.attackOrder})
mapper.select: select cwma.member_tag attackerTag, cwma.clan_tag attackerClanTag, cwma.member_name attackerName, cwma.map_position attackerMapPosition, cwmd.member_tag defenderTag, cwmd.clan_tag defenderClanTag, cwmd.member_name defenderName, cwmd.map_position defenderMapPosition, cwl.create_time createTime, cwl.attack_order attackOrder, cwl.star star, cwl.destruction_percentage destructionPercentage, cwl.war_tag warTag from clan_war_log cwl join clan_war_member cwma on cwl.war_tag = cwma.war_tag and cwma.member_tag = cwl.attacker_tag join clan_war_member cwmd on cwl.war_tag = cwmd.war_tag and cwmd.member_tag = cwl.defender_tag where cwl.war_tag = #{warTag}
